item.title: Arabic and Persian in India
item.description: == Turkc Rulers in North India - 1206-1290 Mamlunk dynasty - 1206-1210 Qutb al-Din Aibak - 1210-1211 Aram Shah i(assassinated by Iltutmish in 1211) - 1211-1236 Shamsud-Din Iltutmish - 1290-1320 Khilji dynasty (Jalal ud-Din Firuz Khilji was killed in 1296 by his nephew and son-in-law Juna Muhammad Khilji. After his death in 1316, his eunuch Malik Kafur, born a Hindu and converted to Islam tried to assume power but was killed.

item.title: Hindi and Urdu
item.description: Hindi and Urdu (Hindustani/Hindvi) have the same syntax and grammar and the language shares its origin with other Indo-European languages such as Bengali, Oriya, Gujarati, Bengali, Marathi etc.
